sources.title: 1938 Yvette ( Käthe Dorsch, Johannes Riemann, Albert Matterstock, Hans Adalbert Von Schlettow, Gustav Waldau, Albert Florath)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938. Yvette.  U.a mit Käthe Dorsch und Johannes Riemann

metadata.Plot: Yvette is the daughter of a courtesan who serves men of wealth and status. She is unaware of how her mother makes money and why they are always in the presence of princes, dukes and barons. Only when Yvette goes away on a holiday she realizes that the Banker Saval is engaging her mother in such activities, she suddenly feels dirty.
metadata.Actors: Käthe Dorsch, Ruth Hellberg, Albert Matterstock
